content.rendered:
Directed by Gokul.

Written by Gokul. John Mahendran. Rishabh Purohit.

Cast Karthi(Kaashmora, Rajnayak). Nayanthara(Ratnamahadevi). Sri Divya(Yamini).Vivek.Jangiri Madhumitha . Anoop(Shekhar’s Friend). Aryan(Bhai Friend). Roshan Chandra(Arjunan). Damodaran(King’s Minister). Deepak(TV Show Audience). Dhanush(Bomb Specialist). Dinesh(Soldier). Divya(Newsreader). Elango(Thirumeni Assistant 1). Gayathri(Yaamini’s Friend). Ajay Gosh(Mahaan). Ramkumar Kalashetra(Deiva Kumari Temple Priest). Mukhtar Khan(King). Sharath Lohitashwa(Minister Dhanakodi (as Sarath Logithashwa)). Madhumitha(Amala). Maya(Samuel’s Daughter). Monica(Press Reporter). Vinod Munna(Assistant Commisioner). Muruganandam(House Broker). Parota Murugesh(Head Constable). Nagesh(Jallapadiraan (Ghost)). Nagesh(Jalapathy Rao). Karuppu Nambiyaar(Inspector Rajalingam). Kayal Perera(Samuvel). Priya(Minister Wife). Stills Raj(Vettiyaan). David Solomon Raja(Inspector Khan Sahib). Pattimandram Raja(Yamini’s Father). Arandhai Rajagopal(Thirumeni Assistant 2). Rajkumar(Advocate). Arumbakkam Ramesh(Rajesh). Beard Ranga(Ghost House Old Man). Madhusudhan Rao(Thirumeni). Santhosh(Kaashmora Assistant 1). Satish(Shekhar). Tamil Selvi(Rajesh Wife). Rayapuram Shanmugham(Bhai). Sharmila(Kaashmora’s Mother). Ramachandra Singh(Party Leader). Baby Smriti(Daiva Kumari). Saravana Subbiah(TV Host). Sudesh(King’s Opponent). Susheendran(Prince). Shaaji Syed(Minister’s PA). Takkar(Kaashmora Assistant 2). Vijaya(Kaashmora’s Grandmother). Siddharth Vipin(Yaamini’s Bride)

Languages Tamil. Telugu.

Producers Aravendraj Bhaskaran. R. Kathiravan. S.R. Prabhu. S.R. Prakashbabu.

Production Dream Warrior Pictures. Goldmines Telefilms.
